name: Dads Garden Hot Shot Sauce
description: Say no to boring food with Dad’s Garden Hot Shot Sauce. The chilli in brine base creates the distinct spicy hit and the herbs and spices are carefully added to balance the sharpness of the taste. Dad's Garden Hot Shot is quite distinct to a sweet hot sauce, which is sugar/tomato-based, and is perfect for adding that spicy kick to your every meal.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
